title: 1951 Doby PC, used w/'51,'51 Bowman, Rare back stamp, Canceled 1951
author: Leon

posts.post_title: 1951 Doby PC, used w/'51,'51 Bowman, Rare back stamp, Canceled 1951
posts.post_content:
1951 Doby PC, used w/'51,'51 Bowman, Rare back stamp, Canceled 1951

Not super rare but have never seen another with red back stamp. 

[STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE] $75 Net to me delivered.
One price reduction to 75 dollars delivered...

I would not say that is a back stamp, it is an advertising postal meter.

Actually likely a nice collectible for a Cleveland fan. 1951 was the redesign of Wahoo to change him to the more modern version (less nose, more red) and the Indians likely set up one Metering machine with the new logo to show it. 

This could possibly be one or the first look of the redesigned logo to the public. You would need to research with a postal meter collector. (As an ex-stamp collector, trust me, they exist)

Interesting note, thanks Justin!!
[quote name="JustinD" post=1841744]I would not say that is a back stamp, it is an advertising postal meter.

Actually likely a nice collectible for a Cleveland fan. 1951 was the redesign of Wahoo to change him to the more modern version (less nose, more red) and the Indians likely set up one Metering machine with the new logo to show it. 

This could possibly be one or the first look of the redesigned logo to the public. You would need to research with a postal meter collector. (As an ex-stamp collector, trust me, they exist)[/QUOTE]
